NG0521:2: sa tha ta tha g+ha b+h+ya /
NG0521:4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i bcud /
NG0521:5: tshe lo lnga brgya pa yi tshe //
NG0521:6: bya rgod spungs pa'i ri bo ru //
NG0521:7: ston pa 'od srungs bgres po la //
NG0521:8: 'khor du dgra bcom bdun gyis bskor //
NG0521:9: thog ma'i sangs rgyas rab bdun dang *//
NG0521:11: la bya nyon mongs gcad bya'i phyir //
NG0521:12: nges pa don gyis chos rnams gsung *//
NG0521:13: 'das pa'i tshul yang bstan pa'i tshe //
NG0521:14: gdul bya dgra bcom 'khor rnams la //
NG0521:15: gdung ba bcad tshig 'di gsungs so //
NG0521:16: e ma chos sgo bsam yas kun //
NG0521:20: rgyus pas las kyis rnam dbye gsal //
NG0521:21: gdungs pas gsol pa drag tu btab //
NG0521:22: lus ngag yid gsum ru shan dbye //
NG0521:23: mi 'gyur lhun grub ma zhen zhog / shes rab rang byung sgron ma yis //
NG0521:24: chos sku ngo bo gcig tu bsdud //
NG0521:25: rgyang zhags chu yi sgron ma yis //
NG0521:26: rig pa ye shes 'char sgo byed //
NG0521:27: dag pa dbyings kyi sgron ma yis //
NG0521:30: thig le stong pa'i sgron ma yis //
NG0521:31: sna tshogs 'od lnga rang gis mdangs //
NG0521:32: rtsal rdzogs chos tshig zad par byed //
NG0521:33: dbyings 'di rig pa'i yul yin no //
NG0521:36: de nas dbyings rig snang ba brtag / 'di la goms pa'i tshad rnyed nas //
NG0521:37: phyi rol snang ba thams cad ni //
NG0521:38: gong nas gong du yar mched nas //
NG0521:39: rims kyis goms nas chos zad de //
NG0521:40: zag bcas rang dengs 'khor dongs sprugs //
NG0521:41: ces gsungs nas 'ja' 'od du yal lo //
NG0521:42: sngags kyi srungs mas srungs cig / s+ya mya ya /
